page.title: 11TRADE (Continued)
page.content: The market on a Tuesday is very big.On a Tuesday you buy clothes,cakes,buns fruit and toys and sometimes books.The market on a saturday is very small it sells just as much as the market on a Tuesday. Hexham shopping centre Hexhams main shop is a big shop called Robbs.Robbs sells toys, food, books, materal, materal telivisons,radios, wine,beer,shoes,clothes and paint. Robbs is a good place for shopping but in my opinion I would rather go to Newcastle for a bigger choice of things.There are lots of other food shops in Hexham like Prestos,Co-op. I think there should be shops for such things as food and D.I.Y.
